GameConditionDef.label: Hail Storm
GameConditionDef.description: A freak, small scale hail storm is ravaging the local area. Any person or creature not hiding under the roof risks getting injured by ice pellets.

GameConditionDef.label: Drought
GameConditionDef.description:
An unusual drought has set in.
Drought is devastating for plant life and will quickly destroy all the crops not planted in the hydroponics. Be sure to quickly harvest any plants you can.

GameConditionDef.label: Space battle
GameConditionDef.description: A space battle is raging in the sky, may last up to 1 day.
